overview: Asha and Sanjeev disapprove of Naina’s relationship with the boy of her choice, which has led to a strained atmosphere in the house.  Naina, fed up with this situation at home, is thinking of moving out. Unaware of her plans, Sanjeev seeks the hand of his friend, Rakesha’s son, and invites them home, while Asha has her heart set on a family, she found on a marriage portal.  The film hereon, tracks Asha and Sanjeev, as an unresolved issue from their past finds its way into an impending argument. Will this confrontation resolve issues amicably, or, will it further their differences?
title: Unresolved
